mapper.sql: WARN_NO, RULE_NO, ECIF_CUST_NUM, WARN_TYPE, WARN_DATE, WARN_INFO, WARN_LEVEL, WARN_STATUS, CLOSE_FLAG, CLOSE_REASON, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_USER, CLOSE_ORG, VALID_DATE, REMARK
mapper.select: select A.WARN_DATE,A.WARN_INFO,A.WARN_LEVEL,A.CLOSE_FLAG,A.CLOSE_DATE,A.CLOSE_REASON, B.RULE_ABSTRACT ruleAbstract,B.STOP_FLAG stopFlag from TB_CSM_WARNING_DEAL A,TB_CSM_WARNING B where A.RULE_NO=B.RULE_NO AND A.ECIF_CUST_NUM=#{ecifCustNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.CLOSE_FLAG DESC
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CSM_WARNING_DEAL (WARN_NO, RULE_NO, ECIF_CUST_NUM, WARN_TYPE, WARN_DATE, WARN_INFO, WARN_LEVEL, WARN_STATUS, CLOSE_FLAG, CLOSE_REASON, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_USER, CLOSE_ORG, VALID_DATE, REMARK ) values (#{warnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ecifCustNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update TB_CSM_WARNING_DEAL
RULE_NO = #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ECIF_CUST_NUM = #{ecifCustNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_TYPE = #{warnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_DATE = #{warnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_INFO = #{warnInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_LEVEL = #{warnLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_STATUS = #{warnStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_FLAG = #{closeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_REASON = #{closeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_USER = #{closeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_ORG = #{closeOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WARN_NO = #{warnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_CSM_WARNING_DEAL set RULE_NO = #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECIF_CUST_NUM = #{ecifCustNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARN_TYPE = #{warnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARN_DATE = #{warnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARN_INFO = #{warnInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARN_LEVEL = #{warnLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARN_STATUS = #{warnStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOSE_FLAG = #{closeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOSE_REASON = #{closeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLOSE_USER = #{closeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOSE_ORG = #{closeOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WARN_NO = #{warnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
